short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the feed from Amazon, so that you can browse distraction free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon is Ugly!
UnAmazon redesigns Amazon, taking away all the unnecessary information and introducing a simpler UI.

UnInternet is a package of UnYoutube, UnInstagram and UnAmazon
